elements.name: Validate the Cart Items number - Add two products

steps.name: I access the Saucedemo Login Page
I enter a username standard_user
I enter a password secret_sauce
I click on the Login button
I should be Logged in and the Header should present the message Swag Labs
The Shopping_cart_badge should not be displayed
I click in Add To Cart button in first product
The Shopping_cart_badge should count 2

elements.name: Validate the Cart Items number - Add two products

steps.name: I access the Saucedemo Login Page
I enter a username standard_user
I enter a password secret_sauce
I click on the Login button
I should be Logged in and the Header should present the message Swag Labs
The Shopping_cart_badge should not be displayed
I click in Add To Cart button in first product
The Shopping_cart_badge should count 2
I click in Cart Icon
The Remove button should be displayed

elements.name: Add any product - All inputs inserted - Successfull

steps.name: I access the Saucedemo Login Page
I enter a username standard_user
I enter a password secret_sauce
I click on the Login button
I should be Logged in and the Header should present the message Swag Labs
The Shopping_cart_badge should not be displayed
I click in Add To Cart button in first product
I click in Cart Icon
I click on Checkout button
I insert first name input
I insert last name input
I insert postal code
I click on continue button
The informations of "Payment Information", "Shipping Information" and "Price Total" are displayed

elements.name: Validate the Continue Shopping - Add Product to the Cart

steps.name: I access the Saucedemo Login Page
I enter a username standard_user

The Shopping_cart_badge should not be displayed
I click in Add To Cart button in first product
I click in Cart Icon
I click on Checkout button
The inputs: first name, last name and postal code should be displayed

elements.name: Validate Successful Login and then Log Out

steps.name: I enter a username standard_user
I enter a password secret_sauce
I click on the Login button
I should be Logged in and the Header should present the message Swag Labs
Click in Burger menu to expand the sidebar menu
Click in LogOut
The user must be logged out
I access the Saucedemo Login Page
I enter a username NonExistent
I enter a password secret_sauce
I click on the Login button
I should be presented with the following login validation message Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service

arguments.val: Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service

I click on the Login button
